answer:
You can still get the pneumonia vaccine if you have had pneumonia as it provides protection against several types of pneumonia. For more information about pneumococcal vaccines check here. If you are referring to a different vaccine please resubmit your question or call your immunization provider for further questions.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## You can still get the pneumonia vaccine if you have had pneumonia as it provides protection against several types of pneumonia.


## For more information about pneumococcal vaccines check here.

If you are referring to a different vaccine please resubmit your question or call your immunization provider for further questions.
Immunization Nurse
question: If I have just had pneumonia can I get the vaccine?
